abstract.p: Greta L Tedoff letter on Daisann McLane's May 14 travel article on bargain hotels on Manhattan's Upper West Side; describes neighborhood's other travel destinations (S)

block.p: To the Editor: There is a lot more to the Upper West Side of New York City than Daisann McLane indicates in her article ''New York's Bargain Hotels, With Help From the Web'' (May 14). The area around 77th Street and Broadway (the site of On the Ave, one of the hotels in which she stayed) is loaded with marvelous restaurants and shops (some of which are even trendy).

To the Editor: There is a lot more to the Upper West Side of New York City than Daisann McLane indicates in her article ''New York's Bargain Hotels, With Help From the Web'' (May 14). The area around 77th Street and Broadway (the site of On the Ave, one of the hotels in which she stayed) is loaded with marvelous restaurants and shops (some of which are even trendy).

The natural history museum and planetarium are three blocks away. A very pleasant walk through Central Park will take the visitor to Museum Mile. This is a neighborhood where the visitor can experience much of what makes New York a special place to visit.
GRETA L. TEDOFF New York, N.Y.
